OOC Sorry logo they're in ice and snow. no grass or flowers.

Bic: Veratis grabbed his temples feeling the pain Shadow Wing was going
through. He grabbed her under the arms and helped her back to his lab. A CR
chamber opened at his command and he placed her inside. It was as he feared,
the protoform in her was rejecting the Polarbear DNA. He stabilized her
condition for now but ran the risk of losing her if nothing was done soon.
He scanned her system and found every cell in her body deteriorating. He saw
no other action open to him. He opened a compartment on the wall and removed
the vial. "I'm sorry Shadow Wing"He thought as he approached the chamber.

"Override Viral search." he instructed the computer while carefully carrying
the vial to the chamber. He injected the liquid into the CR chambers intake
hose and in turn into Shadow Wings system. Now all he could do was wait for
the results.


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 03, 2000 9:04 AM
Subject: Shadow Wing


> Shadow Wing::
>
> She walked around looking for Veratis.  She finally found him and
> smiled. "I like this new form.  I can see so much better now. The
> grass is greener, the sky is bluer, the flowers have such vibrant
> color.  ANd my sence of smell is wild. I can smell a rabbit that is
> in the next sector almost.   It's great. I don't know how to
> thank...." she looked at him as a wave of pain ran over her.  She
> fell to the ground and groaned. The new programs were in conflict
> with te form and it's new abilities. She sent the mental message of
> fear and pain without realizing it.  She tried to get up but fell
> over again. "what's happening? what's wrong with...." she groaned
> loudly and let out a low bear growl.
>
>
>
>
>
